item.0: Discrimination against women is no longer a problem in the United States.
item.1: Women often miss out on good jobs due to sexual discrimination.
item.2: It is rare to see women treated in a sexist manner of television.
item.3: On average, people in our society treat husbands and wives equally.
item.4: Society has reached the point where women and men have equal opportunities for achievement.
item.5: It is easy to understand the anger of women’s groups in America.
item.6: It is easy to understand why women’s groups are still concerned about societal limitations of women’s opportunities.
item.7: Over the past few years, the government and news media have been showing more concern about the treatment of women than is warranted by women’s actual experiences.
